src:
6 Pemain Manchester United Absen Latihan Jelang Lawan Partizan, Siapa Saja?
07 Nov 2019, 14:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United akan berjumpa klub Serbia, Partizan Belgrade, di Liga Europa 2019/2020. Jelang pertandingan tersebut, Setan Merah dihadapkan pada fakta enam pemain tidak menjalani latihan bersama tim utama.
Manchester United masih belum berada dalam performa yang positif. Sempat meraih tiga kemenangan beruntun, akhir pekan lalu United kalah. Setan Merah kalah dengan skor 1-0 atas AFC Bournemouth pada laga Premier League.
United harus segera move on dari hasil buruk melawan Bournemouth. Sebab, United butuh raihan tiga poin di pekan ke-4 Liga Europa. United harus segera memastikan langkah untuk lolos ke babak 32 Besar Liga Europa.
Saat ini, United berada di puncak klasemen Grup L. Marcus Rashford kini sudah meraih tujuh poin. Sedangkan, Partizan masih berada di posisi ke-3 dengan meraih empat poin. Partizan masih punya peluang lolos ke 32 Besar.
text:
6 Manchester United players absent training ahead of Partizan opponents, who?
Nov 7 2019, 14:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United will meet Serbian club Partizan Belgrade in the Europa League 2019/2020. Ahead of the match, the Red Devils were faced with the fact that six players did not undergo training with the first team.
Manchester United is still not in a positive performance. Had won three consecutive wins, last weekend United lost. The Red Devils lost 1-0 to AFC Bournemouth in the Premier League match.
United must immediately move on from bad results against Bournemouth. Because, United need three points in the fourth week of the Europa League. United must immediately ensure steps to qualify for the last 32 of the Europa League.
Currently, United are top of Group L. Marcus Rashford has now won seven points. Meanwhile, Partizan is still in 3rd position by winning four points. Partizan still has a chance of qualifying for the Big 32.
